long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
JSON Web Tokens are an open, industry standard RFC 7519 method for representing claims securely between two parties.

You can use this extension as a security way to decode JWT tokens and view their contents, avoiding unprotected websites that can store them. 

Updates:
v1.1 - Now your decoded token will be saved in your local browser session, so you can view it later. You also have the possibility to clear it if needed.
